articles.title: I went on my first solo cruise to the Caribbean and worried about getting bored on the ship. I ended up having more fun than expected.
articles.description: I'm no stranger to traveling alone, but was curious of how going solo in giant cities or mountain towns translated to a cruise. I still had a lot of fun.
articles.content:
As Business Insider's aviation reporter, I typically spend as much of my time on airplanes as possible.
